snippet.title: Leif's Adventure: Netherworld Hero | Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Join Leif and his loyal sidekick Ghost as they combine their strengths to overcome the sinister forces of the Netherworld. In this story-driven, co-op action-adventure inspired by Nordic folklore, friendship proves to be the greatest power of all.

Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/en-gb/Games/Nintendo-Switch-download-software/Leif-s-Adventure-Netherworld-Hero-2488710.html
PS5: https://store.playstation.com/nl-nl/concept/10012410
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1392980/Leifs_Adventure_Netherworld_Hero/

-

Subscribe and turn on notifications to get notified about the newest game releases for the PlayStation 4/5, Nintendo Switch, Xbox and PC! 🎮

Follow our social media channels for more information about the game:
Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/mindscape.official/
Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/MindscapeGames
Twitter : https://twitter.com/MindscapeGames
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@mindscapegames
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/mindscape

-

Mindscape® has been successfully developing, publishing, distributing game and entertainment products for over 30 years. We have captured the mind and imagination of millions of people worldwide. The goal of Mindscape® is to bring products that are easy to pick-up and fun to play.
